name: Antique Shops: Sales, Repairs, and Restoration Services
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell antiques and may or may not also conduct some
repair or restoration work. Products for sale may include furniture,
jewelry, cameras and photographic equipment, tools, artwork, books,
appliances, and other household items.
For merchants that sell antique automobiles, use MCC 5521.
For merchants that primarily repair or restore antique furniture, use
MCC 7641.
